message: I'm working on an app locally so I have a settings file for my local dev (settings_dev) and the production settings are just the default settings file.
As I'm working, I'm adding/changing settings in settings_dev
I've ended up re-arranging some settings so that there's defaults and it might be less of an issue (per some examples here: http://code.djangoproject.com/wiki/SplitSettings)
should I test these changes to make sure they exist in settings or is there a better way to go about this whole process?
@rob_ballou Sounds like you figured out a good approach.  Thanks for the link!
